collaboration_notes.conversation_reference: Initial context memory system setup discussion

context_system_setup.content: Established comprehensive context memory system for strategic project collaboration between project manager and development team

pm_knowledge_model.content: Project manager has complete mental model of customer requirements and architectural evolution history - this knowledge needs to be captured in context files
pm_knowledge_model.implication: Context files are currently incomplete - need PM input to flesh out details

evolutionary_architecture_complexity.content: Project has evolved through multiple architectural phases - strategic refactoring approach needed to preserve functionality
evolutionary_architecture_complexity.key_challenge: Balance between modernizing architecture and preserving critical existing functionality

initial_population_approach.content: Agreed to violate normal amendment protocol during initial population phase, then audit each file before normal usage
initial_population_approach.rationale: Better to get complete structure in place then refine, rather than perfect each file individually
